mainText:
Bank of Entitlement Promo: "Get a loan with ZERO interest rates at Bank of Entitlement! Because you deserve everything, even money for nothing."

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into Bank of Entitlement, demanding immediate service because my time is too valuable to wait like a mere mortal. The teller dares to ask me to fill out a form-outrageous! I throw a fit and demand to see the manager, who I inform quite loudly that my presence alone should have them rolling out the red carpet. In the end, they not only waive the form but also offer me a VIP banking experience with a personal banker at my beck and call. As I leave, I bask in the glow of my entitlement, knowing that I have once again proven that I am indeed the center of the universe.
